price: 38 Tous ces péchés sont réprouvés du Seigneur.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
